channel.title: Paramiters for running on linux? REP++
channel.description:
heres my .bat file
[code] @echo off title InsidiaX "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause [/code]
does anyone know what i would need to get this to run in linux?
will rep++ thanks

item.title: Paramiters for running on linux? REP++
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

heres my .bat file

@echo off
title InsidiaX
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

does anyone know what i would need to get this to run in linux?

will rep++ thanks
